mapper.update:
update tbl_sysmenu_info
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
parent_menu_code = #{parentMenuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
menu_idx = #{menuIdx,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
application_code = #{applicationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
up_time = #{upTime,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
where 1=1 and menu_no = #{menuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_sysmenu_info where 1=1 and menu_no = #{0}
SELECT * FROM tbl_sysmenu_info WHERE menu_no in (SELECT b.menu_no FROM tbl_sysuser_role_info a ,tbl_sysrole_menu_info b WHERE a.role_no = b.role_no AND a.user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=CHAR} )
